RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the department: United States Department of Homeland Security

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Magistrate Judge: judge who signed the Report and Recommendation, making recommendations based on articulable factors indicating that illegal activity might be afoot
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States District Judge: judge who conducts independent review of motions to suppress and reviews the findings, conclusions, and recommendations of the Magistrate Judge
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol: involved in the stop of RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR. and IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.; considered the behavior of vehicles' drivers in determining reasonable suspicion to stop; followed suspicious vehicles for approximately five minutes; conducted a roving stop; familiar with most vehicles on Farm-to-Market Road 2050; interacted with law enforcement during the traffic stop; involved in the arrest and questioning of IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.; location of questioning; had sufficient evidence to conclude that two vehicles were driving in tandem
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Department of Homeland Sec: received information regarding attempted alien smuggling events; conducted interviews at the Freer immigration checkpoint; involved in the prosecution of individuals and bears the burden of proving that stops were constitutional
